Reviews.Title: “Bruce and Debbie Tunny”
Reviews.Author: dtunny
Reviews.Content: From the minute we walked in the door we were very impressed with the cleanliness and the outstanding customer service/hospitality extended to us. We highly recommend the suite with the whirlpool overlooking the swimming pool. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely pass the word to friends. Cudos to Pam Bullock and her staff!

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend this hotel to any non-smoker!”
Reviews.Author: MomOfEMM
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel 2 nights with our 3 children. Pool area is really nice! Room was a decent size, but felt a bit overcrowded because of all the furniture in it (desk with chair, chair with ottoman, bench, etc.) The fridge and microwave were wonderful!!! Our room was a non-smoking room, but the hallway was so full of smoke - either from bad venting or from people smoking out there - that our room smelled smokey a majority of the time. It smelled like it was coming right in the bathroom vent, so we closed the bathroom door and this helped some. Breakfast is okay especially if you are trying to save a little time or money. The smokiness was a major turnoff and I would not recommend this hotel to any non-smoker.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Lee V
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a great stay with great amenities. Inside pool, completely furnished rooms, etc. The staff is friendly and helpful. Everything is very clean. I had no problems with my stay here. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Superbowl Stay was Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: stacey m
Reviews.Content: What a great city for the superbowl. The Baymont Inn's Hospitality was phenomenal. They had great desk staff, housekeepers, and transportation. We were very impressed. We had our twelve year old son with us and he thoroughly enjoyed the snacks and the extended indoor pool hours. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome pool, large rooms, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: noahsmommy
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel with our 4-year old on a family trip to Indianapolis. Here's the good and bad: Pro's- The pool is awesome! Very warm, clean, and really large for a hotel this size. The jacuzzi was the perfect temperature and the pool is open 24 hours, except for kids under age 18 it is only open until 11. GREAT pool area! The staff was friendly and tried to be helpful, but didn't seem to know much about the area. The hotel was just off the highway but very quiet and had a nice homey feel to it. There's nice quiet sitting areas with lamps all around the lobby so you can sit and hang out. There's also a nice little "living room" in the lobby with couches and a TV where you would feel comfortable just coming and hanging out. The room was very clean and larger than a normal king room. Although not huge, the room did have a king bed, and also a sitting area that allowed plenty of room for our child to spread his toys out. The bathroom sink is seperate from the shower and toilet, which is nice with a little one. The shower had a tub, which is also nice with a child. All the rooms have a fridge and microwave, which we loved! The decor was a little outdated but not a big deal for us. This is the first hotel we haven't had a flat screen TV in, they had the old tube type TV that didn't have the best picture. But, still worked fine and my son didn't seem to care! They do have a small fitness room that isn't fancy but will get the job done. There was one treadmill, one bike, and one eliptical machine. It is also open 24 hours. Con's; The hotel doesn't seem to be in a real "suburban" area, meaning there wasn't any of your staple stores (grocery, Target, restaurants, Walmart, etc) really close. We ended up driving about 10-15 mins to find major restaurants and stores, but once we found them there was everything you would need. If you head about 10-15 west from the hotel it is a sketchy area and I wouldn't take my family anywhere near that area of town. We were on the search for a restaurant and found ourselves in an area that we weren't comfortable with. The front desk staff didn't seem to know much about the area or the local festivals etc. I recommend using your computer to find what you want to do and not rely on the staff for their help. The breakfast was just ok, nothing fancy. It did save us money and time as we could just eat there but the choices were slim and not excitingm, especially for those of us trying to eat healthy. There were waffles, pastries, bread and bagels, a few cereal choices, yucky looking apples, watered down juice, and a few other things. Nothing exciting and no one really keeping things stocked and straightened. If you want some healthy choices, bring your own food. There was nothing there for me to eat. The fresh fruit looked like it had been around for a few days.

Reviews.Title: “pleasant”
Reviews.Author: scooby-BTR
Reviews.Content: have stayed here for 3 years in a row as I attend the FDIC show as a vendor. our corporate HQ is just down the street so staying here is very convenient. staff friendly and nice. room always great.

Reviews.Title: “First stay, won't be the last.”
Reviews.Author: sengstock
Reviews.Content: Clean room with very comfortable bed and bedding. Prompt and courteous staff. Great 24 hr pool room.

Reviews.Title: “The Best of the Best !”
Reviews.Author: Bruce H
Reviews.Content: This award winning hotel was top notch! I have spent upwards of 200 nights per yr on the road, and Sales Manager Pam Bullock, did not disappoint! From the front desk staff, to the cleaning crew... all were hospitable, and courteous! The hotel was a little removed, from town but quiet, yet convenient to downtown Indy. I will definitely make this my hotel home when on business in the Indy area!! My previous stays include the Omni, and Springhill Suites downtown... The Baymont Inn & Suites Indianapolis is the best value I have found! Thanks to you, and your wonderful staff Pam!! ~BH 08-27-11

Reviews.Title: “great pool”
Reviews.Author: hershdog
Reviews.Content: Pool was always clean and warm....friendly staff....good location....great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Employees”
Reviews.Author: PebblesBarney
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here many times. Every person I have encountered at the front desk is always so nice, friendly, and accommodating. Any special requests I have, are honored with speed and accuracy. They are so nice to my two doggies, too! Comfortable beds/ great towels.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Service & Staff!Will definitely come back!”
Reviews.Author: ILOVECATS1205
Reviews.Content: My family had a great stay at this Baymont. It is clean , friendly staff and terrific in door heated pool! The price was of great value and the breakfast was just enough to get our day started. Will definitely come back again when visiting Indianapolis!

Reviews.Title: “noisy one night and desk staff did not care!”
Reviews.Author: frequenttraveler2914
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 nights; 1st night was fine. 2nd night the people in the room next to me were talking loudly until 3:15 am; talked to desk staff about it and they said they couldn't do anything about it and that some people were just louder than others. Well I had to be up at 6:45 am and I did not appreciate that attitude! otherwise clean hotel and would stay there again for the money (80/night).

Reviews.Title: “A really nice Baymont!”
Reviews.Author: ASMTSM04
Reviews.Content: Was there on business, just 1 night, but was really happy with it! The staff was very polite, the beds were very comfy, had a/c-heating units where you could actually digitally set the temp...the coffeemaker made 1 cup at a time and was ideal......overrall a really nice place, hope to return soon!

Reviews.Title: “Great New Hotel”
Reviews.Author: smokeyjsbbq
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel and it is new, the rooms were plenty big enough and the beds were very comfortable, room had microwave and fridge as well as a desk area and big tv. they were super clean and the staff was very friendly, wqe really enjoyed the pool which is open 24 hours my kids 8 and 9 loved it also. The Hotel inlocated in an area tyhat is being devolped so there is not a lot of things around it but it is located just a short driving disatnce from everything you need. the breakfast was good it was your normalk contenital breakfast but with homemade waffles which my family loved, we usually stay at Drury Inns but decided to try this one at 99.00 during race weekend you cant beat it.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty Good”
Reviews.Author: mezzamistic
Reviews.Content: Not a lot of frills, but you get what you pay for. It had a small pool (which was actually better for my family with small children). The exercise room was very small (only 3 machines). The breakfast was pretty good, but nothing too special. My favorite was how the bathroom still looked like new and was nice and clean. The bed and pillows were comfy. It was quiet at night. My GPS couldn't find the hotel, but we called the hotel for help. They have a large screen computer and printer in the lobby to use for free. All in all, I'm satisfied with my stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Can't Wait To Go Back!”
Reviews.Author: shysheebaby
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I really enjoyed our stay at the Baymont Inn. We had a whirlpool suite. The room was very clean and the staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The overall experience was excellent and we do plan on going back.

HotelInfo.Name: Baymont Inn and Suites Indianapolis
HotelInfo.Address: 1540 Brookville Crossing Way, Indianapolis, IN 46239
